title: Founding Experience
description: Founded The Friday Company, a startup focused on revolutionizing how teams collaborate and manage their work. As a founding engineer, I led the development of our core product, built the initial team, and helped shape our technical strategy.

achievements.title: Key Achievements
items: Led the development of our flagship product
Built and mentored the initial engineering team
Established technical architecture and best practices
Contributed to product strategy and roadmap

impact.title: Impact
items: Successfully launched MVP to first customers
Built scalable infrastructure from the ground up
Created a culture of technical excellence
